statements: DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_name = 'UPS' AND estimated_delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND status = 'In Transit';
DELETE FROM tracking_info WHERE status = 'Delivered' AND DATE(tracking_date) = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM shipments_history WHERE history_id IN (SELECT history_id FROM shipments_history WHERE new_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY status_change_date DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE sender_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM delays WHERE resolved = TRUE;
